results.deck: Smackdown Vs. Raw 2007 is the third installment in the Smackdown Vs. Raw series.
results.name: WWE SmackDown! vs. RAW 2007

results.deck: The famous soccer game comes back this year with updated teams and players. The control mechanics were modified, featuring heavy use of the skill stick, and upping the tempo of the entire game.
results.name: FIFA Soccer 07

results.deck: New Job classes, battle types, missions, quests, and more "player friendly" options highlight the third expansion for Final Fantasy XI.
results.name: Final Fantasy XI Online: Treasures of Aht Urhgan

results.deck: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 07 is an iteration in the popular EA sports golf series. Starring Tiger himself, the game includes improved visuals over previous games and a large cast of superstar golfers such as Phil Mickelson and Vijay Singh.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 07

results.deck: A next-generation port of the original Far Cry Instincts as well as Far Cry Instincts:  Evolution.
results.name: Far Cry: Instincts - Predator

results.deck: Take the role of Wolverine, Iceman and Nightcrawler and use their superpowers through a series of missions.
results.name: X-Men: The Official Game

results.deck: Super Thunder Blade is a shooter casting the player as a helicopter pilot tasked with, almost, single-handedly defeating an enemy army. Super Thunder Blade was one of the two original Japanese launch titles for the Mega Drive. The other was Space Harrier II.
results.name: Super Thunder Blade

results.deck: Team up again with the Las Vegas Police Department CSI team and see if you can crack five new cases in this fifth CSI game featuring a revamped interface and fresh graphics.
results.name: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation - Hard Evidence

results.deck: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Advanced Warfighter 2 puts the player back into the action as a member of the Ghost squad as they try to stop prevent the Mexican Civil war from spilling over into the USA
results.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Advanced Warfighter 2

results.deck: Splinter Cell: Double Agent puts a new spin on the series, placing Sam Fisher undercover in a terrorist group, where moral decisions affect gameplay.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Double Agent

results.deck: An online-focused shooter based on the tabletop RPG of the same name, giving players modern weapons as well as various magic abilities. It was the first game to allow cross-platform play between Xbox 360 and PC players on the same servers.
results.name: Shadowrun

results.deck: Virtua Fighter 5 is a 3D fighting game by Sega known for having a large arcade base in Japan, featuring persistent statistics and character appearance data. It released for the Sega Lindbergh arcade hardware in 2005. Like its predecessors, it was considered to have the best graphics in a video game upon release. It was later ported to the PS3 and Xbox 360.
results.name: Virtua Fighter 5

results.deck: A crazy bumper car game from Burger King, consists of five different game modes.
results.name: Big Bumpin'

results.deck: WarTech: Senko no Ronde is an arcade shoot-em-up/fighter hybrid for the Xbox 360.
results.name: WarTech: Senko no Ronde

results.deck: In the sixth entry in the popular horror franchise, Leon S. Kennedy is sent to investigate when the President's daughter is kidnapped by terrorists with an unclear agenda. With the game receiving a complete overhauling from previous titles, and a story unrelated to the T-virus or the Umbrella Corporation, Resident Evil 4 is one of the most lauded action games ever made.
results.name: Resident Evil 4

results.deck: Challenge as your favourite national squad for the World Cup.
results.name: FIFA World Cup: Germany 2006

results.deck: Play as Lyra in attempt to save her father in this game based on the novel adapted movie of the same name.
results.name: The Golden Compass

results.deck: Boom Boom Rocket is an Xbox Live Marketplace rhythm game where the goal is to blow up fireworks over a city in tune with techno/trance music inspired by classical scores.
results.name: Boom Boom Rocket

results.deck: Chris Taylor follows up his critically acclaimed title "Total Annihilation" with Supreme Commander. This time players take control of one of three factions and put an end to the "Infinite War" that has been raging across the galaxy.
results.name: Supreme Commander

results.deck: The sequel to Rainbow Six: Vegas returns with a brand new story of terrorist attacks and the Rainbow squad's attempt to stop them.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Vegas 2

results.deck: Reducing the four-man squad to two specialised roles, the Conflict series moves to a first-person perspective with an emphasis on co-operation and destructive action.
results.name: Conflict: Denied Ops

results.deck: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare ditches the World War II motif of the past Call of Duty games to tell a story set in contemporary times, and backs it up with a solid, feature-rich multiplayer mode.
results.name: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare

results.deck: A simulation game in which players transform a neglected plot of land into a lush garden in order to attract various piñata animals and encourage them to become residents on your land.
results.name: Viva Piñata

results.deck: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer follows a closer look into the movie, including chases with the Silver Surfer and fights with Dr. Doom. It also contains extra missions including finding scientists to save the world. It allows four player to each control a member of the Fantastic Four.
results.name: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer

results.deck: Ridge Racer 6 is an Xbox 360 launch title, and the first Ridge Racer to feature online multiplayer and leaderboards.
results.name: Ridge Racer 6

results.deck: The sequel to the smash hit original game, Infinity Ward returns to the familiar World War 2 setting. In this installment, players take control of four different characters, each of a distinct, allied nationality, as they fight though hordes of Nazi's on their quest to free the world.
results.name: Call of Duty 2

results.deck: The Ghost Recon team must enter Mexico City and prevent a coup d'état led by rebel Mexican forces.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Advanced Warfighter

results.deck: Alien Storm is an arcade beat-em-up by Sega in the same vein as the more successful Golden Axe. The game was ported to a number of different home systems, most notably the Sega Genesis.
results.name: Alien Storm

results.deck: The first game in the Halo series of sci-fi first-person shooters. Halo: Combat Evolved is considered largely responsible for pioneering console shooters.
results.name: Halo: Combat Evolved

results.deck: Lost Odyssey tells the epic journey of Kaim, a 1000 year old immortal with no memory of his past. He soon discovers there are other immortals as a conspiracy begins to unravel.
results.name: Lost Odyssey

results.deck: Assassin's Creed is a stealth action-adventure game developed by Ubisoft Montreal. In the year 2012, Desmond Miles is kidnapped and made to relive his ancestor's memory through a machine called the Animus. As the ancestor, Altaïr, players unveil an assassin conspiracy set in the middle ages.
results.name: Assassin's Creed

results.deck: Scene It? is an XBox 360 adaptation of the DVD-based board game in which players, armed with the included "Big Button Buzzers", pit their movie trivia knowledge against up to 3 opponents to see who can rack up the most points before the game ends.
results.name: Scene It? Lights, Camera, Action

results.deck: The second game in id Software's Quake series. Not actually a direct sequel to Quake, Quake II tells a story of an alien invasion. It casts the player as a lone space marine named Bitterman who must fight the villainous alien Strogg on their home planet of Stroggos.
results.name: Quake II

results.deck: Step into the boots of either a Union soldier or a Confederate soldier and fight in some of the bloodiest battles of the American Civil War
results.name: Civil War: A Nation Divided

results.deck: A reboot of sorts for the Rainbow Six series, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Vegas drops the player into a fictional version of Las Vegas to stop a terrorist plot.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Vegas

results.deck: A video game based around French cartoon character Asterix attending the Olympics.
results.name: Asterix at the Olympic Games

results.deck: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 06 is the series debut on the Xbox 360. The game featured upgraded visuals and gameplay elements on the Xbox 360, but suffered from glitches and inaccessible achievements.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 06

results.deck: An action video game based from the third installment of the Shrek movie series.
results.name: Shrek the Third

results.deck: Quake III: Arena is a popular multiplayer focused first-person shooter from iD Software released in 1999.
results.name: Quake III Arena

results.deck: DiRT is an off-road rally racing game and is the sixth game in the Colin McRae series of games.
results.name: DiRT

results.deck: F.E.A.R. Files combines the two PC expansion packs--Extraction Point and Perseus Mandate--into one Xbox 360-exclusive collection.
results.name: F.E.A.R. Files

results.deck: The fourth instalment of the series (Guitar Hero: Rock the 80's being the 3rd) that single handedly revitalized the music-game genre, Guitar Hero III retains the core gameplay of its predecessors while delivering a more challenging experience.
results.name: Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock

results.deck: Jump into the shoes of a genetically-enhanced operative of The Agency and fight off criminal organizations alone or with a friend in Crackdown, an open-world sandbox game for the Xbox 360.
results.name: Crackdown

results.deck: Blitz: The League is an arcade style football game and is a part of the long running Blitz series by Midway.
results.name: Blitz: The League

results.deck: Prototype is an open-world action game from Radical Entertainment. You are Alex Mercer, a human transformed by a deadly virus into a virtually invincible killing machine.
results.name: Prototype

results.deck: TMNT is based on the 2007 CGI movie, and features action-platforming with some teamwork-based gameplay elements.
results.name: TMNT

results.deck: Pocket Bike Racer is a racing game released by Burger King much in the vein of cartoon racing games such as Mario Kart.
results.name: Pocketbike Racer

results.deck: F.E.A.R. is a first-person shooter borrowing elements from Japanese horror. It employs bullet time abilities and large quantities of blood to create a gory action experience.
results.name: F.E.A.R.: First Encounter Assault Recon

results.deck: The follow-up to EA's well-received Lord of the Rings RTS, adding custom hero creation, free placement of buildings, and a story mode that covers lesser-known battles from the books.
results.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II

results.deck: Phantasy Star Universe tells the story of a Guardian named Ethan Waber who is on a mission to save his sister and stop a mysterious life form known as the SEED.
results.name: Phantasy Star Universe

results.deck: 'Bully: Scholarship Edition' takes place at the fictional New England boarding school Bullworth Academy, and tells the story of mischievous 15-year-old Jimmy Hopkins as he goes through the hilarity and awkwardness of adolescence. Beat the jocks at dodge ball, play pranks on the preppies, save the nerds, kiss the girl.
results.name: Bully: Scholarship Edition

results.deck: NHL 07 was the 16th game of the NHL franchise from EA Sports.
results.name: NHL 07

results.deck: In Electronic Arts' Skate, you create a skater and complete various photo and video challenges to get sponsors and become well known in the skating world as you appear on magazines such as Skateboard Mag and Thrasher.
results.name: skate.

results.deck: Bionicle Heroes is a third-person shooter based off the popular line of toys from Lego.
results.name: Bionicle Heroes

results.deck: The evil Orochi warps time and space, pulling the greatest warriors of Three Kingdoms China and Warring States Japan to battle for his amusement.  This crossover game features most of the playable characters from Dynasty Warriors 1-5 and Samurai Warriors 1 & 2.
results.name: Warriors Orochi

results.deck: An action-adventure hack n' slash title for the Nintendo Wii. In it, players follow otaku Travis Touchdown in his quest to become the highest-ranked assassin in the world (and, perhaps, get together with the mysterious Sylvia Christel).
results.name: No More Heroes

results.deck: Project Gotham Racing 4 builds on the foundation of PGR3, adding weather effects and new multiplayer modes, as well as the ability to ride motorcycles in the game.
results.name: Project Gotham Racing 4

results.deck: The web-slinging, joke cracking, Spider-Man is back. The third game in the movie tie-in series sees Spider-Man battle more foes than ever and even get a new makeover, and of course,  it offers plenty of swinging around the city.
results.name: Spider-Man 3

results.deck: Saints Row is an open-world crime game which lets you create a character and help a man named Julius and his gang, the 3rd Street Saints, rise to the top and take back control of Stilwater.
results.name: Saints Row

results.deck: Burnout Paradise turns the Burnout series on its head by moving from closed set tracks to an open world full of events to experience both alone and in a group online.
results.name: Burnout Paradise
World Series of Poker 2008: Battle for the Bracelets

results.deck: Hoodlum Havoc is a 3-D platformer from Ubisoft starring limbless hero Rayman. A hilarious story takes a few twists as Rayman sets out to stop the evil black lum Andre and his army of hoodlums.
results.name: Rayman 3: Hoodlum Havoc

results.deck: Forza Motorsport 2 brings Microsoft's racing sim series to the Xbox 360 with new tracks, new cars, and an impressive livery editor.
results.name: Forza Motorsport 2

results.deck: Worldwide Soccer Manager 2007 is a game that allows the player to act as a manager of a large number of soccer clubs worldwide.
results.name: Worldwide Soccer Manager 2007

results.deck: Take on the role of a paratrooper in the US 82nd Airborne Division during World War II. Fight to retake control of Europe during several key campaigns in Italy, Netherlands, France, and Germany.
results.name: Medal of Honor: Airborne

results.deck: Under Defeat is a shoot 'em up developed by G.rev.
results.name: Under Defeat

results.deck: TimeShift is a First-Person Shooter that puts you into the shoes of a nameless scientist who dons a suit with the ability to stop, slow down, and rewind time.
results.name: TimeShift

results.deck: An action-strategy game set during the Hundred-Years' War, the player controls a mercenary, growing in stature by helping to secure each victory.
results.name: Bladestorm: The Hundred Years' War

results.deck: Test Drive Unlimited is an open world racing game that takes place on the island of Oahu in Hawaii. It features over 1000 miles of open roads which you may traverse in a hot Ferrari or in a blazing Kawasaki race bike.
results.name: Test Drive Unlimited

results.deck: Team up with the CSI Las Vegas crew to solve five murder cases as the newest member of the team. Put your detective skills to test and see if you can crack the case.
results.name: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation - 3 Dimensions of Murder

results.deck: Madden '06 introduces  the Truck Stick and Superstar Mode to EA's popular Madden franchise.
results.name: Madden NFL 06

results.deck: The fourth game in the popular Capcom action franchise, Devil May Cry. Take on the role of new playable character Nero, as he uses his swanky demon arm to beat the hell out of a demon invasion in the castle town of Fortuna.
results.name: Devil May Cry 4

results.deck: Team up as Homer, Marge, Bart, and Lisa as you enter a strange and vast video game world, with parodies of popular series like EverQuest, Medal of Honor, and Grand Theft Auto. Popluar video-game characters such as Sonic and Mario have their own parodies too.
results.name: The Simpsons Game

results.deck: Take destruction to a new level of bone breaking carnage!
results.name: FlatOut: Ultimate Carnage

results.deck: Cabela's African Safari is a 2006 release in the trophy hunter franchise.
results.name: Cabela's African Safari

results.deck: The follow-up to Vice City takes the free-roaming violence to the state of San Andreas, an analog to early '90s California, where ruthless gangs battle for control of the streets.
results.name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas

results.deck: A racing game/minigame collection based vaguely on the 2006 Disney/Pixar movie Cars, and features the full movie voice cast. The game varies greatly between platforms, and features infamously blatant rubber banding from AI players.
results.name: Cars

results.deck: NBA Live 06 is the first game in the franchise to reach next generation consoles.
results.name: NBA Live 06

results.deck: Tony Hawk's American Wasteland is the 7th game in the Tony Hawk franchise released in 2005. Developed by Neversoft and published by Activision, it was the first Tony Hawk game to be released on the Xbox 360 and the last one for the Gamecube.
results.name: Tony Hawk's American Wasteland

results.deck: The quintessential gritty reboot, in which a redesigned Bomberman (this time a cyborg) must survive 99 rounds of enemies to gain freedom from a dark underground facility. It was met with scathing reception, and was named the Flat-Out Worst Game of 2006 by Gamespot.
results.name: Bomberman: Act Zero

results.deck: An arcade style TPS, which in 53 levels, pits you against giant ants, giant spiders, giant robots and UFOs. Luckily for you, the game has an arsenal of over 150 different weapons and 4 different vehicles, all collectible throughout the game. And don't forget, every building is destructible! And how.
results.name: Earth Defense Force 2017

results.deck: EA Sports NBA game
results.name: NBA Live 07

results.deck: An epic RPG from Final Fantasy creator Hironobu Sakaguchi that follows the journey of three friends - Shu, Kluke and Jiro - as they use newfound magical powers to challenge the evil, tyrannical wizard Nene.
results.name: Blue Dragon

results.deck: Call of Duty 3 is a World War II-themed first-person shooter developed by Treyarch and published by Activision.
results.name: Call of Duty 3

results.deck: Take control of some of the most iconic superheroes of the Marvel Universe in this squad-based RPG. Form a well known group such as the Fantastic Four or create your own custom group of heroes to battle Dr. Doom and the Masters of Evil.
results.name: Marvel Ultimate Alliance

results.deck: Surf's Up is a multiplatform game developed by Ubisoft based on the movie of the same name. As a variety of avian characters from the movie, players compete in surfing challenges.
results.name: Surf's Up

results.deck: Join Crash on his latest quest to stop Dr. Cortex from his nefarious plans and rescue his sister Coco. Crash of the Titans features all new graphics and some serious platforming fun.
results.name: Crash of the Titans

results.deck: With a story made up of the three eras in the Star Trek universe, Star Trek Legacy allows players to take control of many Federation star ships and combat the likes of Klingons, Romulans, and the Borg collective.
results.name: Star Trek Legacy

results.deck: The fourth official installment in Team Ninja's Dead or Alive fighting game series is brought to the seventh generation of video game consoles, complete with expanded online gameplay and a hidden crossover with the Halo franchise.
results.name: Dead or Alive 4

results.deck: Fight Night Round 3 is a boxing game developed by EA Chicago that has been released on multiple platforms.
results.name: Fight Night Round 3

results.deck: Fly the world’s most powerful fighters on this fighter Jet simulation for the Xbox 360. With more than 40 intense missions in a modern-day global conflict.
results.name: Over G Fighters

results.deck: Anniversary is a remake of the original Tomb Raider game, running in the engine from Tomb Raider: Legend. Join Lara Croft as she travels the world on her very first adventure all over again!
results.name: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: Anniversary

results.deck: A golfing simulation with real life courses, golfers, and equipment.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 08

results.deck: Visual Concepts returns to the gridiron with the greatest football players of all-time taking the field once again in All-Pro Football 2K8.
results.name: All-Pro Football 2K8

results.deck: Lara travels across the world in search of a legendary artifact. The game is considered a restart for the series after the poor reception for Angel of Darkness. It is also the first Tomb Raider game developed by Crystal Dynamics after they took over the role from Core Design.
results.name: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: Legend

results.deck: The third game in the Soldier of Fortune series brings it is signature blood soaked gameplay to the Playstation 3, Xbox 360, and PC.
results.name: Soldier of Fortune: Payback

results.deck: Play as wartime photojournalist Frank West as he tries to survive a zombie invasion while trapped in the Willamette Parkview Mall in Colorado. Dispatching the undead with whatever comes to hand, Frank has 72 hours to get the story of his life.
results.name: Dead Rising
